TopicTitle: Have you ever had this moment

Articles.Content: Have you experienced playing with lots of realism mod, like FAR, life support, remotetech, or whatever, then you get burned out by the difficulty and complexity, and you said to yourself, "screw this, I'm going to play KSP back the way it is; unrealistic and simple"?
Yes....FAR never makes my rockets go very FAR....HAHAHAHAHHA BEST PUN EVARLDKSNTFGOIANOSD
That's actually the reason I never even tried FAR, deadly reentry and TAC lifesupport, or any realism mods of that sort.
lol i have FAR deadly reentry and TAC LS its soo hard but easy xD
